p: This work was supported by the Annetta Carter Memorial Fund from the California Botanical Society, a UC MEXUS Student Research Grant, the Explorers Club Exploration Fund, an American Alpine Club Research Grant, the University of California, Irvine’s Center for Environmental Biology, the Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology, and UCI’s School of Biological Sciences. Additional funding was provided by the University of California, Irvine Summer Undergraduate Research Program [to M.L.].
